description:
The battle between Hibari and the Phantom Knight continues in the box weapon testing grounds. The Phantom Knight may seem to have the advantage, but his attacks aren`t working against Hibari… The Phantom Knight opens his box, Spettrale Nudibranc, and surrounds Hibari with its illusions. The experienced Hibari from the future could defend himself against the invisible Nudibranc but how will the Hibari from the past cope?
Source: crunchyroll
